original_text: And they hammered out gold leaf, and he cut it into threads to work into the blue and purple and the scarlet yarns, and into the fine twined linen, in skilled design.
korean_text: 금을 얇게 쳐서 오려서 실을 만들어 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가는 베 실에 섞어 정교하게 짜고

sentences.original_text: And they hammered out gold leaf
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 금을 두들겨 펴서 금박을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and he cut it into threads
to work into the blue and purple yarns
sentences.korean_translation: 푸른 실과 자주 실에 수놓기 위해

sentences.original_text: and into the fine twined linen
